$interpreted: Annie: ...The reconstruction of the Desert Kingdom seems to be going smoothly. Queen Diana sent an official thank you letter.
Angelia: This is simply wonderful. Please send a response, the Kingdom of the Sun will do its best to provide assistance.
Angelia: We sincerely hope that the Desert Kingdom recovers from this disaster as soon as possible.
Naya: Yes, ma'am. I'll send someone immediately.
Angelia: This way, perhaps the conflict between the two kingdoms will make a turn for the better.
Naya: And it's all thanks to the queen's bad habit of running around...
Marshals of Nobility : Your Majesty!
Angelia: Hello everyone...
Marshals of Nobility : Us nobles have long sought an audience with you, but it is becoming more and more difficult. It's all thanks to your bad habit of running around...
Angelia: May I ask...why you have come?
Marshals of Nobility : Your Majesty is well aware of the answer. As representatives of the nobles, there is but one reason why we would seek you out.
Naya: Angel, can't help you here. Besides...
Naya: To be honest, I think they've got a point.
Marshals of Nobility : Indeed...deciding a suitable suitor and heir to the throne are urgent matters for the Kingdom of the Sun.
Angelia: I understand...it's just, I have no admirers...
Marshals of Nobility : And what's the problem there? Just give us the nod of approval and we will find someone suitable immediately.
Angelia: Um...is this really a pressing matter? The civil war just ended...

Marshals of Nobility : It's precisely because the war just ended that this be done. The people are still feeling unstable. 

They need to see what the future of the kingdom looks like. Only then will their hearts be at ease.
Marshals of Nobility : Your Majesty, this is a massive responsibility!
Angelia: I...this...
Guard: Reporting!
Naya: What's the matter?
Guard: Outside is a student of the Rune Academy. She claims to have important news and must report it directly to the queen.
Marshals of Nobility : Be gone! We're discussing important matters with Her Majesty...
Angelia: Alright! I'll meet him right away!
Marshals of Nobility : Your Majesty! We haven't finished...
Angelia: The Rune Academy provides important military support, we must not keep them waiting. Pardon me, everyone. We'll finish this conversation later?
Guard: Yes, ma'am! I'll bring them in right away!
Li Hwa: I finally found you~you look miserable, fellow disciple.
Aosta: You, you're from...
Li Hwa: Yes~seeing as I'm your elder, do mind your manners, now.
Aosta: Hmph, the Professor did leave records of a female student, but there's no way it was you.
Li Hwa: And how can you be so sure?
Aosta: The day the Professor was revived, he did not even notice you, no?
Li Hwa: Ah...
Li Hwa: Well, Professor Morris couldn't recognize me at this age.
Li Hwa: After all, us Jellyfish are able to bring back our youthful vigor~
Aosta: Indeed. You mean to tell me that when you sought out the Professor, you looked like a grandmother——
Li Hwa: Eh? My friend, why have you fallen all of a sudden?
Aosta: It couldn't be because I said you were a grand——
Li Hwa: Huh? What's that? What did you just say?
Aosta: ......
Li Hwa: Young man? Are you still conscious? ...Did you really pass out?
Aosta: Your drugs are quite effective.
Li Hwa: Thank you for the compliment.
Aosta: But for you to say you were the great Professor's first disciple, I can't simply take your word for it.
Aosta: After all, Professor Dietrich, he...
Aosta: ...doesn't pay heed to ordinary folk...
Li Hwa: ...Did Professor Morris go overboard on you? Like call you an idiot, or a monkey, or a baboon, or a chimp, or a bonobo...
Aosta: ......
Li Hwa: ...Before he accepted me as his disciple, Professor Morris did that to me as well.
Li Hwa: If you pursue knowledge for desires other than the desire for knowledge itself, then knowledge may be destroyed in the process.
Aosta: ...So, as a scholar, knowledge must be pursued for its own sake. One cannot add other value judgements outside of knowledge itself.
Aosta: Especially in the field of Life Magic, where a multitude of taboo subjects are touched upon. That is the way it ought to be.
Li Hwa: Wow~you can recite that inside and out, huh~Well, then you can't blame Professor Morris for getting mad at you.
Aosta: You're familiar with all that...so Professor Dietrich really has taught you?
Old Professor: Oooooooh! It's working, it's working!
Aosta: That geezer's experiment failed again!?
Li Hwa: Hasn't changed...brings back memories. Good thing the professor's not around. He hates Applied Magic inventions the most.
Aosta: You really do know him, don't you?
Li Hwa: ...If this thing keeps running around, students are gonna get hurt. Come now, help out a fellow disciple~
Aosta: I don't get it...
Li Hwa: What's the matter?
Aosta: Even though you use Qi energy, like the Beasts, the attack you just used, it's like a Rune...
Li Hwa: ...Much like the logic behind the Runes you use, no?
Aosta: But you're a Beast. Beasts can't use Runes!
Li Hwa: And the living cannot be brought back from the dead.
Li Hwa: ...That's what we're taught.
Li Hwa: ...Trust what you see. Do not hold onto these restrictions.
Li Hwa: Including the teacher himself, everything can be challenged, overturned...this is what Professor Morris wants to see.
Li Hwa: Do you understand? The genius, Aosta Clovis.

Model.Text: ...The reconstruction of the Desert Kingdom seems to be going smoothly. Queen Diana sent an official thank you letter.
This is simply wonderful. Please send a response, the Kingdom of the Sun will do its best to provide assistance.
We sincerely hope that the Desert Kingdom recovers from this disaster as soon as possible.
Yes, ma'am. I'll send someone immediately.
This way, perhaps the conflict between the two kingdoms will make a turn for the better.
And it's all thanks to the queen's bad habit of running around...
Your Majesty!
Hello everyone...
Us nobles have long sought an audience with you, but it is becoming more and more difficult. It's all thanks to your bad habit of running around...
May I ask...why you have come?
Your Majesty is well aware of the answer. As representatives of the nobles, there is but one reason why we would seek you out.
Angel, can't help you here. Besides...
To be honest, I think they've got a point.
Indeed...deciding a suitable suitor and heir to the throne are urgent matters for the Kingdom of the Sun.
I understand...it's just, I have no admirers...
And what's the problem there? Just give us the nod of approval and we will find someone suitable immediately.
Um...is this really a pressing matter? The civil war just ended...

It's precisely because the war just ended that this be done. The people are still feeling unstable. 

They need to see what the future of the kingdom looks like. Only then will their hearts be at ease.
Your Majesty, this is a massive responsibility!
I...this...
Reporting!
What's the matter?
Outside is a student of the Rune Academy. She claims to have important news and must report it directly to the queen.
Be gone! We're discussing important matters with Her Majesty...
Alright! I'll meet him right away!
Your Majesty! We haven't finished...
The Rune Academy provides important military support, we must not keep them waiting. Pardon me, everyone. We'll finish this conversation later?
Yes, ma'am! I'll bring them in right away!
I finally found you~you look miserable, fellow disciple.
You, you're from...
Yes~seeing as I'm your elder, do mind your manners, now.
Hmph, the Professor did leave records of a female student, but there's no way it was you.
And how can you be so sure?
The day the Professor was revived, he did not even notice you, no?
Ah...
Well, Professor Morris couldn't recognize me at this age.
After all, us Jellyfish are able to bring back our youthful vigor~
Indeed. You mean to tell me that when you sought out the Professor, you looked like a grandmother——
Eh? My friend, why have you fallen all of a sudden?
It couldn't be because I said you were a grand——
Huh? What's that? What did you just say?
Young man? Are you still conscious? ...Did you really pass out?
Your drugs are quite effective.
Thank you for the compliment.
But for you to say you were the great Professor's first disciple, I can't simply take your word for it.
After all, Professor Dietrich, he...
...doesn't pay heed to ordinary folk...
...Did Professor Morris go overboard on you? Like call you an idiot, or a monkey, or a baboon, or a chimp, or a bonobo...
...Before he accepted me as his disciple, Professor Morris did that to me as well.
If you pursue knowledge for desires other than the desire for knowledge itself, then knowledge may be destroyed in the process.
...So, as a scholar, knowledge must be pursued for its own sake. One cannot add other value judgements outside of knowledge itself.
Especially in the field of Life Magic, where a multitude of taboo subjects are touched upon. That is the way it ought to be.
Wow~you can recite that inside and out, huh~Well, then you can't blame Professor Morris for getting mad at you.
You're familiar with all that...so Professor Dietrich really has taught you?
Oooooooh! It's working, it's working!
That geezer's experiment failed again!?
Hasn't changed...brings back memories. Good thing the professor's not around. He hates Applied Magic inventions the most.
You really do know him, don't you?
...If this thing keeps running around, students are gonna get hurt. Come now, help out a fellow disciple~
I don't get it...
What's the matter?
Even though you use Qi energy, like the Beasts, the attack you just used, it's like a Rune...
...Much like the logic behind the Runes you use, no?
But you're a Beast. Beasts can't use Runes!
And the living cannot be brought back from the dead.
...That's what we're taught.
...Trust what you see. Do not hold onto these restrictions.
Including the teacher himself, everything can be challenged, overturned...this is what Professor Morris wants to see.
Do you understand? The genius, Aosta Clovis.

It's working, it's working!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_213_004_dialog_english##_25_000","SpeakerName":"Aosta","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0005","IconName":"h0005s4_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"That geezer's experiment failed again!?","sfxName":"h0005_story_008","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_213_004_dialog_english##_25_001","SpeakerName":"Li Hwa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0180","IconName":"t0180s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Hasn't changed...brings back memories. Good thing the professor's not around. He hates Applied Magic inventions the most.","sfxName":"human_female_kid_03","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_213_004_dialog_english##_25_002","SpeakerName":"Aosta","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0005","IconName":"h0005s4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You really do know him, don't you?","sfxName":"h0005_story_014","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_213_004_dialog_english##_25_003","SpeakerName":"Li Hwa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0180","IconName":"t0180s5_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...If this thing keeps running around, students are gonna get hurt. Come now, help out a fellow disciple~","sfxName":"human_female_kid_04","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_213_004_dialog_english##_26_000","SpeakerName":"Aosta","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0005","IconName":"h0005s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I don't get it...","sfxName":"h0005_story_013","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_213_004_dialog_english##_26_001","SpeakerName":"Li Hwa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0180","IconName":"t0180s5_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"What's the matter?","sfxName":"human_female_kid_02","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_213_004_dialog_english##_27_000","SpeakerName":"Aosta","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0005","IconName":"h0005s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Even though you use Qi energy, like the Beasts, the attack you just used, it's like a Rune...","sfxName":"h0005_story_015","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_213_004_dialog_english##_27_001","SpeakerName":"Li Hwa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0180","IconName":"t0180s5_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Much like the logic behind the Runes you use, no?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_213_004_dialog_english##_27_002","SpeakerName":"Aosta","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0005","IconName":"h0005s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"But you're a Beast. Beasts can't use Runes!","sfxName":"h0005_story_018","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_213_004_dialog_english##_27_003","SpeakerName":"Li Hwa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0180","IconName":"t0180s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"And the living cannot be brought back from the dead.","sfxName":"human_female_kid_03","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_213_004_dialog_english##_27_004","SpeakerName":"Li Hwa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0180","IconName":"t0180s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...That's what we're taught.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_213_004_dialog_english##_28_000","SpeakerName":"Li Hwa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0180","IconName":"t0180s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Trust what you see. Do not hold onto these restrictions.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_213_004_dialog_english##_28_001","SpeakerName":"Li Hwa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0180","IconName":"t0180s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Including the teacher himself, everything can be challenged, overturned...this is what Professor Morris wants to see.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_213_004_dialog_english##_28_002","SpeakerName":"Li Hwa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0180","IconName":"t0180s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Do you understand? The genius, Aosta Clovis.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0}]}
